section.title: Test Systems
section.para: These are some notes on the Test Systems used for Testing Ardour.
There needs to be at least one physical test system for each supported platform, or a dual/triple boot configuration. The test systems should not be used for development unless unavoidable.
For each supported platform their should be a test system that is specified as the minimum supported system in terms of CPU speed, Memory size, HDD speed and of course OS Version.
